item.title: How activist Mantle Ridge's presence at Cognizant can help lift the company's valuation
item.description: Signals suggest that Mantle Ridge likes Cognizant's new leadership and supports the board's actions. The Street may come to appreciate the stock.

item.title: Here are the most oversold stocks due for a trader’s bounce following the market rout

item.title: Apple had an ugly week. Here’s why it’s worth buying, investor Nancy Tengler says
item.description: Tengler, an investor known for her "old economy" stock plays, appeared on CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Friday to give her hot takes.
